name: Jesse, We Need To Cook
description:
A little game I developed from an idea that Bobsenjr presented to me.

This is a simple cooking game that I might turn into something else someday. It was a learning experience for me, and I am still learning.

I this game you receive orders, and cook raw burgers to perfection. Then you add the toppings from the order to the burger, and submit the orders.

How To Play

  • Wait for ORDER at the bottom.
  • Select UNCOOKED BURGER on the left of the STOVE.
  • Select PAN to cook BURGER on.
  • Wait for BURGER to cook. The bar will turn GREEN.
  • Select COOKED BURGER, then select empty BURGER BUN BOTTOM.
  • Select TOPPING then select BURGER to place item.
  • After placing all TOPPINGS from the ORDER. Select the BURGER TOP and place on the BURGER.
  • Select COMPLETED BURGER, then select ORDER.
  • Note, to delete the selected item, click on the white TRASH BIN on the right.

Controls

  • Click on items to select them.
  • ESC will bring up settings menu in game.

Assets

  • Buttons Set - KartInnka
  • Bubble Font (Free Version) - Jazz Create Games
  • Mouse & Keyboard Icons Pack - QUBITS
  • Burgers Constructor - Justiplay
  • Zowwy's Kitchen Appliances - ZowwyDesign
  • Furniture And Appliances - Stove - PijayArt
  • 4 PBR Pans - 3D.BJ
  • Complete Classic Style Kitchen - Alex Jun
  • Plates, Bowls & Mugs Pack - Robot Skeleton
  • Spices and Sauces Pack - Lockem Reality
  • Trash Bin - Rodolfo Rubens
  • FREE MUSIC - The Patreon Music Collection Volume 1 - Tony Longworth
  • (Unity) Better Minimal WebGL Template - Sean S. LeBlanc
